answerText: osteoclasts [do not accept "osteoblasts"][10] This essential vitamin for bone health can be obtained by drinking milk. Its deficiency causes rickets.
heading: Illinois Fall Touranment |2012 | 5 | 20 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: These cells use podosomes to adhere to bone, then secrete a mixture of hydrochloric acid and proteases to dissolve the bone and break down its protein components. For 10 points each: [10] Name these cells that facilitate bone resorption.
